        "12afdde74c864b4299c6db805a3f19dd": {
          "stepType": "ReferenceChoicePrompt",
          "name": "Selection",
          "prompt": {
            "value": "Please select a record.",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "confirmMessage": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "acknowledgeMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "mode": "query",
            "value": ""
          },
          "optional": false,
          "defaultValue": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "variableId": "9d9bc2fe47eb4c29b52941562eba75d6",
          "id": "12afdde74c864b4299c6db805a3f19dd",
          "mode": "glide_record",
          "script": "",
          "noRecordsResponseMsg": {
            "value": "No Records Found",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "condition": {
            "mode": "glide_scripted_query",
            "value": "(function execute(table) {\n\n    var order = {};\n    order.field = vaVars.order_by;\n    order.desc = vaVars.order_desc == true;\n\n    var pagination = {};\n    pagination.limit = parseInt(vaVars.limit_per_page);\n    pagination.index = parseInt(vaVars.index);\n    pagination.end_index = pagination.index + pagination.limit;\n\n    var count = parseInt(vaVars.count);\n    if (count == 0) count = vaVars.count = getResultsCount(table, vaVars.encoded_query);\n    \n    if (count == 0) return [{ label: 'No results.', value: '' }];\n\n    var results = getResults(table, vaVars.encoded_query, order, pagination);\n    results = addPaginationOptions(results, pagination, count);\n    return results;\n\n    function getResultsCount(table, query) {\n        var ga = new GlideAggregate(table);\n        ga.addAggregate(\"COUNT\");\n        if (query) ga.addEncodedQuery( query );\n        ga.query();\n        if (ga.next()) return ga.getAggregate(\"COUNT\");\n        else return 0;\n    }\n\n    function getResults(table, query, order, pagination) {\n        var results = [];\n        var gr = new GlideRecord(table);\n        if (query) gr.addEncodedQuery(query);\n        if (order.field) {\n            if (order.desc) gr.orderByDesc(order.field);\n            else gr.orderBy(order.field);\n        }\n        gr.chooseWindow(pagination.index, pagination.end_index);\n        gr.query();\n        while (gr.next()) {\n            results.push({\n                label: gr[vaVars.display_field].toString() || gr.getDisplayValue(),\n                value: gr.getUniqueValue()\n            });\n        }\n        return results;\n    }\n\n    function addPaginationOptions(results, pg, count) {\n        if ( pg.index > 0 ) {\n            results.push({\n                value: 'decrement',\n                label: 'Show previous '+pg.limit\n            });\n        }\n        if ( count > pg.end_index ) {\n            var nextPageCount = pg.limit;\n            var remainingCount = count - pg.end_index;\n            if (remainingCount <= pg.limit)\n                nextPageCount = remainingCount;\n            results.push({\n                value: 'increment',\n                label: 'Show next '+nextPageCount+' ('+count+' total)'\n            });\n        }\n        return results;\n    }\n    \n})(table)\n"
          },
          "table": "cmn_location"
        },

          "expression": {
            "mode": "script",
            "value": "(function execute() {\n\n    if (vaInputs.selection == 'increment' || vaInputs.selection == 'decrement') {\n        var count = parseInt(vaVars.count);\n        var index = parseInt(vaVars.index);\n        var limit = parseInt(vaVars.limit_per_page);\n        if (vaInputs.selection == 'increment' && index + limit < count)\n            vaVars.index = index + limit;\n        if (vaInputs.selection == 'decrement')\n            vaVars.index = (index > limit) ? index - limit : 0;\n        return true;\n    } else return false;\n    \n})()"
          },
          "label": "page change"
        },

            "value": "(function execute() {\n    return vaInputs.selection != '' && vaInputs.selection != 'increment' && vaInputs.selection != 'decrement';\n})()"
